declarations.name: AppBindings
declarations.description: A TypeScript type defining the bindings for the application, specifically the Variables object for Hono context. Used to type the context variables available in the app's request handlers.

declarations.name: AppOpenAPI
declarations.description: A generic TypeScript type alias for OpenAPIHono, parameterized by a Schema (defaulting to an empty object). It provides a strongly-typed Hono instance with the application's bindings and schema for OpenAPI integration.

declarations.name: AppRouteHandler
declarations.description: A generic TypeScript type alias for a RouteHandler, parameterized by a RouteConfig and using the application's bindings. Used to type REST or OpenAPI route handlers in the app.
